actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that, after the signing of the agreement on ending the war and restoring peace in Vietnam, all U.S. military involvement in Indochina shall be prohibited.

summary.text: Provides that, 60 days following the signing of the agreement on ending the war and restoring peace in Vietnam, all United States military involvement in Indochina shall be prohibited.

titles.title: A bill to provide that, after the signing of the agreement on ending the war and restoring peace in Vietnam, all U.S. military involvement in Indochina shall be prohibited.
